original_text: At that time Marduk-Baladan son of Baladan king of Babylon sent Hezekiah letters and a gift, because he had heard of his illness and recovery.
korean_text: 그 때에 발라단의 아들 바벨론 왕 므로닥발라단이 히스기야가 병 들었다가 나았다 함을 듣고 히스기야에게 글과 예물을 보낸지라

sentences.original_text: Marduk-Baladan son of Baladan king of Babylon
sent Hezekiah letters and a gift
because he had heard of his illness
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 그의 병에 대해 들었음이라
